features.name: Authentication
features.description: User authentication with Google OAuth and Magic Link email verification

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main user dashboard displaying health overview and quick actions

features.name: Health Tracking
features.description: Track health metrics including weight, sleep, mood, energy levels, and custom metrics

features.name: Food Analysis
features.description: AI-powered food photo analysis with ingredient recognition and nutritional breakdown

features.name: Insights
features.description: AI-powered health insights and personalized recommendations based on user data

features.name: Supplements Management
features.description: Track supplements with photo recognition, timing, dosages, and interaction checking

features.name: Medications Management
features.description: Track medications with safety checks and interaction warnings

features.name: Lab Reports
features.description: Upload and analyze PDF lab reports with AI extraction of biomarkers

features.name: Medical Images
features.description: Upload and analyze medical images with AI

features.name: Symptoms Tracking
features.description: Log symptoms with photos and descriptions, AI pattern analysis

features.name: Chat and Voice AI
features.description: Conversational AI assistant with voice support for health queries

features.name: Billing and Subscriptions
features.description: Stripe integration for subscription management and credit purchases

features.name: Credit System
features.description: Usage-based credit system for AI features with daily and monthly limits

features.name: Onboarding
features.description: Multi-step onboarding flow for new users

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Administrative interface for user management and system administration

features.name: Check-ins
features.description: Daily check-in system for tracking health status and issues

features.name: Reports
features.description: Generate and view health reports

features.name: Devices Integration
features.description: Integration with health devices like Fitbit for automatic data sync

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile management with image upload

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Push notifications and reminder system

features.name: Settings
features.description: User settings and preferences

features.name: Support
features.description: Support ticket system and help pages

features.name: Waitlist
features.description: Waitlist signup for early access

features.name: Layout and Navigation
features.description: Main layout wrapper and navigation components

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Analytics tracking for user behavior
